title: 821-01072-A
message:
Hello guys, 

Need to replace microphone on one iMac A2115 2019 with board 820-01236-A, the PN is: "821-01072-A MFC0919" 

Everything I found, says "821-01072-A MFC2217" for A1419 2017 iMac. 

Do you think/know if they are compatible?

title: 821-01072-A
message:
Must work.
MFCxxxx should be manufacturing date.
